metadata.title: CVE-2024-4467

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5

metadata.description: A flaw was found in the QEMU disk image utility (qemu-img) 'info' command. A specially crafted image file containing a `json:{}` value describing block devices in QMP could cause the qemu-img process on the host to consume large amounts of memory or CPU time, leading to denial of service or read/write to an existing external file.
